Uses of Class
inair.view.UIView

  • Packages that use UIView 
    Package Description
    inair.api
    Contain all base interfaces api
    inair.app
    Contain all base control classes
    inair.view
    Contain all declaration views of inAiR system

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UIView IAController.findUIViewById(int id)
      Finds a view that was identified by the id attribute from the XML that was processed in #onInitialize(android.os.Bundle).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method to set root view of this activity, bind view model object to this view and attach root view to render tree
      void IALayout.setRootContentView(UIView rootView)
      Method to set root view of this activity, bind current data context of layout as view model object to this view and attach root view to render tree
